      MedicalService createService(List<Task> taskList, String label)
      Create a new Medical service, based on label and associated tasks list.
      Parameters:
      taskList - tasks to be associated with the new Medical service
      label - label to be assigned to the new Medical service
      Returns:
      a new MedicalService object, according to input data
